hero.title: Experience the Full Power of
hero.description: Get faster response times, priority access to new features, and stable access even during peak hours.

features.title: Why Choose Plus?
features.description: Unlock a powerful set of features designed to enhance your productivity and creativity.

speed.title: Faster Response Speed
speed.description: Experience significantly faster responses, allowing you to iterate faster and complete more tasks in less time.

access.title: Access During Peak Hours
access.description: Don't let high traffic slow you down. Plus subscribers get stable access, even during high demand.

priority.title: Priority Access to New Features
priority.description: Be the first to experience the latest improvements and advanced features as soon as they are released.

security.title: Data Security
security.desc1: Does not use data to train OpenAI models
security.desc2: Data is encrypted both "at rest" and "in transit"

workspace.title: Enterprise Workspace
workspace.desc1: Business plan for a minimum of 2 users
workspace.desc2: Member management, role assignment, admin control. Share projects and custom GPTs within the workspace

aiModels.title: Advanced AI Models
aiModels.desc1: Access "frontier" models like GPT-4 with unlimited usage (with guardrails)
aiModels.desc2: Data analysis, Code edits, File uploads, Vision are better supported

connectors.title: Connectors
connectors.description: Connects to Gmail, Outlook, SharePoint, Google Drive so ChatGPT can query enterprise data

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.desc1: Supports Projects, Tasks within the workspace
collaboration.desc2: Create & share custom GPTs for teams/departments. Record mode to record and summarize meetings

compliance.title: Standard Compliance
compliance.desc1: SAML SSO, MFA, admin roles, domain verification
compliance.desc2: SOC 2 Type 2, ISO 27001/27017/27018/27701. Supports data region selection (US, EU, UK, JP, CA, KR, SG, IN, AU, UAE)

pricing.title: Pricing & Payment
pricing.desc1: Approximately US$30/user/month (monthly payment) or US$25/user/month (annual payment)
pricing.desc2: Flexible payment, can add/transfer number of seats within the month

testimonials.title: Loved by Creators & Developers
testimonials.description: See what our Plus subscribers say about their upgraded experience.

pricing.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Experience?
pricing.description: Join thousands of users enhancing their productivity with ChatGPT Plus.

q1.question: What do I get with ChatGPT Plus subscription?
q1.answer: With ChatGPT Plus, you get faster response times, stable access even during peak hours, and priority access to new features and improvements.

q2.question: How does Technow handle subscriptions?
q2.answer: Technow acts as a local payment gateway, making it easy for you to subscribe using local payment methods. We manage payments so you can enjoy uninterrupted access.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q3.answer: Yes, absolutely. You can manage and cancel your subscription anytime through your Technow account dashboard. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing cycle.

footer.aboutDescription: Making advanced technology accessible to everyone.
